frontmatter.title: What did users say?
frontmatter.excerpt: Learn users' talking topics and opinions from TripAdvisor reviews through Markov clustering algorithm.
frontmatter.technologies: Artificial Intelligence, Unsupervised Learning, Natural Language Processing, Graph Algorithm
frontmatter.approach: After transforming text reviews into TF-IDF matrix, I applied Markov Clustering algorithm to group the words into topics, visualizing what users talk about.

frontmatter.title: How much to spend on advertising?
frontmatter.excerpt: Predict customer net contribution from pay-per-click channel. The prediction is used as an input for decision making on advertising budget.
frontmatter.datasets: Hotel booking transaction from an online travel agency
frontmatter.approach: After applying feature engineering on the dataset, I separated the transactions into one-time bookers and non-one-time bookers. Then I built separate linar regression models to predict the net contributions for the two customer groups using R packages.
frontmatter.partners: Boonsit Yimwadsana, Waran Taveekarn, and Papichaya Quengdaeng

frontmatter.title: Is it a park or a garden?
frontmatter.excerpt: Help volunteers on OpenStreetMap clean the classes of map entities by suggesting likely classes to the volunteers. The focus is to clean the green entities on the map. The classes of green entities can be grass, garden, park, meadow, forest, etc.
frontmatter.approach: Develop a web application to suggest volunteers likely classes of the entities, according to the contructed associative classification. If the volunteers agree with the recommendation, the entity is updated with the suggested class.

frontmatter.title: Smart Home with a Blink?
frontmatter.excerpt: Let physically-impaired people to control electronic appliances with blinks.
frontmatter.approach: Design UX/UI and develop an application on UWP (Universal Windows Platform) to connect with Arduino, allowing the application to turn electronic appliances on and off.
frontmatter.partners: Apirak Hoonlor, Sataponn Phutrakul, and Suthida Lertviriyasawat

frontmatter.title: Learning inside the Zoo
frontmatter.excerpt: Help children navigate and learn more about wildlife inside the zoo through multimedia and augmented reality
frontmatter.approach: Develop an Android application, providing zoo navigation with augmented reality, animal encyclopedia, and games.
frontmatter.partners: Ananta Srisuphab, Piyanuch Silapachote, Jinkawin Phongpawarit and Krittanat Sutassananon
